sentences.en: Congratulations to the BDA on its centenary.
sentences.cn: (戴安娜手语发言)贺英国聋协成立一百周年.

sentences.en: Funds will be raised for it, especially through our centenary season.
sentences.cn: 更多基金将被注入, 尤其是在俱乐部大庆之年.

sentences.en: In 21 st centenary, the world will get into the era of global knowledge economy.
sentences.cn: 1世纪, 世界将进入全球化的知识经济时代.

sentences.en: In the 21 st centenary such inter country projects should be encouraged.
sentences.cn: 在21世纪这样的国际工程应该得到鼓励.

sentences.en: Next year is the centenary of her death.
sentences.cn: 明年是她逝世一百周年纪念.

sentences.en: Next year will be the centenary of this firm.
sentences.cn: 明年是这家公司成立的一百周年.

sentences.en: Some say he was alluding to the centenary of the Fabian Society, founded in 1884.
sentences.cn: 有些人说他是暗示1884年成立的费边社成立一百年。

sentences.en: The Chinese Post Office issued some stamps commemorating the centenary of Lenin's birth.
sentences.cn: 中国邮局发行邮票纪念列宁百年诞辰.

sentences.en: The club will celebrate its centenary next year.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部明年要庆祝成立一百周年。

sentences.en: The club will celebrate its centenary next year.
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部明年要庆祝一百周年纪念.

sentences.en: The college did us proud at the centenary dinner.
sentences.cn: 院方在一百周年校庆设宴款待我们.

sentences.en: The NAACP celebrated its centenary on February 12 th.
To make things even easier , the club is providing secure parking outside the Centenary Stand.
sentences.cn: 为方面顾客, 俱乐部将在百年看台外提供安全舒适的泊车环境.

trans.tran_en: the day or year exactly 100 years after a particular event

trans.tran_cn: 一百周年纪念，百年间，一世纪
trans.tran_en: the day or year exactly 100 years after a particular event
